description:
Standing proudly across 1619sqm (approx.), this charming weatherboard home offers the charisma and scale of yesteryear, while providing the convenience of the Macedon Ranges lifestyle. Occupying a desirable, central, Romsey location, there is endless renovation, investment and development potential for the astute purchaser to enjoy (STCA).

Stepping inside, high ceilings and generously proportioned spaces make for a light filled and flexible floor plan. Beyond the entry hall, a large lounge immediately welcomes guests and perfectly provides for relaxing evenings in seamless flow to the oversized kitchen. Spanning the length of the kitchen, a large island bench presents the ideal family hub and meeting place. Extensive cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and sweeping views into the back yard make for a functional space, fit for meals of any scale. Nearby, a complementing dining area occupies the heart of the home, making family time easy.

Stepping outside, the extensive grounds offer bountiful surrounds and a blank canvas opportunity. Established plantings and mature garden beds grace the front of the property, enhancing the welcoming street appeal and classical facade. Sprawling from the rear French doors and across the paved alfresco, the allotment presents an ideal prospect for future development, with plans drawn for three additional residences (STCA). In its current form, the yard offers an open front shed and two small, contained yards, perfect for furry friends, an edible garden and exploration by little ones.

Accommodation is ideally provided with three sumptuously proportioned bedrooms. Two bedrooms border the entryway and offer sunlit views into the lush front yard. The larger of the rooms provides extensive built-in wardrobes, with the adjacent bedroom presenting a large walk-in wardrobe. The third bedroom is found nearby to the lounge room and also offers a walk-in wardrobe. A central bathroom provides ideal proximity for family living, with a large corner bath and extended vanity.

Located within a few minutes' stroll of all the Romsey village amenities, this is the ideal property for those looking to make their Macedon Ranges start, enhance their investment portfolio or establish a central development.

Additional features include refrigerated heating and cooling, a solar system, wood fire heater, split system, ceiling fans, wall heaters, a large mud room and laundry with toilet, outbuilding and garden sheds of varying sizes and a secure rear yard.

Located in the Macedon Ranges, Romsey is just 60km north of Melbourne CBD, half an hour drive to Melbourne Airport and 10-15 minutes away from Clarkefield or Riddells Creek Train Stations.

For further details please do not hesitate to contact Debra Watchman on 0409 828 490.
